name: Rocket Dodge (iPaCX)
description:
This game was made in 1h for a game jam

- Easy controls - just hold or tap the screen
- Straightforward Gameplay - Fly as far as possible for the best score
- 2 Difficulty Modes; Normal for beginners and Hard for more experienced players
- Choose between 2 different graphic types
- New Remastered Graphics with an option to switch them back to Originals
- Option to disable sound effects
- 3 Special Pieces of Background Music crafted by composer dullsworth

Release Date: 30.07.2021
